category.name: Integration.TCAA
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: TCAA105_dataset_default_naming_rule
preference.preference_description: Through this option it is possible to configure the naming rule applied to the datasets created by TCAA. If the preference is set to an empty string, TCAA does not enforce any naming rule. Therefore datasets are named as per the naming rules currently configured in Teamcenter. If the preference is set to a non-empty string, it is used as a pattern to generate the name of datasets created by TCAA. The pattern consists of any literal text string(s) combined with one or more of the following tokens: ${Item.item_id}, ${ItemRevision.item_revision_id}, ${FileName} and ${FileExtension}. The default value of the preference is ${Item.item_id}/${ItemRevision.item_revision_id}.
